Package com.defano.jmonet.algo.dither

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Ditherer
    An object that applies a QuantizationFunction to a BufferedImage and dithers (diffuses) the resulting quantization error.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDitherer
    Abstract base class for implementers of Ditherer that operate on 24-bit, true color ARGB images.
    AtkinsonDitherer
    An implementation of Bill Atkinson's dithering algorithm.
    BurkesDitherer
    An implementation of the Burkes dithering algorithm.
    FloydSteinbergDitherer
    An implementation of the Floyd-Steinberg dithering algorithm.
    JarvisJudiceNinkeDitherer
    An implementation of the Jarvis-Judice-Ninke dithering algorithm.
    NullDitherer
    A no-op dithering algorithm; provides no dithering whatsoever.
    SierraDitherer
    An implementation of the Sierra-3 dithering algorithm.
    SierraLiteDitherer
    An implementation of the Sierra-Lite dithering algorithm.
    SierraTwoDitherer
    An implementation of the Sierra-Two (row) dithering algorithm.
    StuckiDitherer
    An implementation of the Stucki dithering algorithm.
